name: DarkLast
description: DarkLast - horror in the dark. You have to understand your dark past. The forest is preparing you a lot of surprises. Your task - to get out of the uncharted forest. Swamps and thickets is only a small part of what you will meet.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit) Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
